mapper.select: select post_name from employee_ e, post_ p, connect_emp_post cep where e.company_id = #{companyId} and e.employee_id = #{employeeId} and e.employee_id = cep.employee_id and cep.post_id = p.post_id

select p.company_id,y.company_name, c.department_id ,d.department_name,p.post_id,p.post_name,p.post_proficiencies,p.post_work_type, p.educational_requirements,p.post_principal_id,e.employee_name from organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.connect_emp_post_ c on c.post_id=p.post_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=c.department_id LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on e.employee_id=p.post_principal_id LEFT JOIN organization.company_ y on y.company_id=p.company_id where c.employee_id =#{employeeId} and c.department_id=#{departmentId} and c.post_staus='0' and c.is_delete='0'

select p.post_id,p.post_name from organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.connect_emp_post_ c on c.post_id=p.post_id LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on e.employee_id=c.employee_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=e.department_id where c.employee_id =#{employeeId} and c.department_id=#{departmentId} and e.employee_status in('0','1') and c.is_delete='0' and c.post_staus='0'

SELECT DISTINCT p.company_id,y.company_name, p.department_id ,d.department_name,p.post_id,p.post_name, p.post_proficiencies,p.post_work_type,p.educational_requirements,p.post_principal_id,e.employee_name FROM organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on e.employee_id=p.post_principal_id LEFT JOIN organization.company_ y on p.company_id=y.company_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=p.department_id where p.post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND p.company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.post_id,p.post_name FROM organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=p.department_id where p.department_id=#{departmentId} AND p.company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.company_id,y.company_name, p.department_id ,d.department_name,p.post_id,p.post_name,p.post_proficiencies,p.post_work_type,p.educational_requirements,p.post_principal_id,e.employee_name FROM organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on e.employee_id=p.post_principal_id LEFT JOIN organization.company_ y on p.company_id=y.company_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=p.department_id
and p.post_id in (select p.post_id from organization.post_ p where post_name like '%${postName}%')
and p.post_id in (select p.post_id from organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=p.department_id where d.department_name like '%${departmentName}%')
and p.company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.company_id,y.company_name, p.department_id ,d.department_name,p.post_id,p.post_name,p.post_proficiencies,p.post_work_type,p.educational_requirements,p.post_principal_id,e.employee_name FROM organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on e.employee_id=p.post_principal_id LEFT JOIN organization.company_ y on p.company_id=y.company_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=p.department_id where p.company_id=#{companyId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.company_id, y.company_name, p.department_id , d.department_name, p.post_id, p.post_name, p.post_proficiencies, p.post_work_type, p.educational_requirements, p.post_principal_id, e.employee_name FROM organization.post_ p LEFT JOIN organization.employee_ e on e.employee_id=p.post_principal_id LEFT JOIN organization.company_ y on p.company_id=y.company_id LEFT JOIN organization.department_ d on d.department_id=p.department_id where p.company_id=#{companyId}
AND (p.department_id = #{departmentId} OR d.department_parent_id = #{departmentId})
AND p.post_name like '%${postName}%'
AND d.department_name like '%${departmentName}%'
limit #{pageRecordNum}::integer offset #{fromPageNum}::integer
mapper.update: update organization.post_ set post_name = #{postName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_proficiencies = #{postProficiencies,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_work_type = #{postWorkType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, educational_requirements = #{educationalRequirements,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_principal_id = #{postPrincipalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where post_id = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
